title: Group portrait of John Wesley AME Zion Church pony league team, from left, first row: Manager H. Perry, far left; J. Walker, G. Goodman, L. Carmichael, C. Bibbens, G. Davis, A. Johnson, D. Carmichael and L. Richardson; back row: Rev. A. Marshall, L. McDonald (in front of the pastor), J. Henderson, R. Terry, L. Yellows, M. Flournoy, F. Gumuca, D. Richardson, R. Sneed, Terry, and Manager J. Wright
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
